projects.title: Aegis
projects.description: Aegis is an ambitious computer vision turret controller that leverages YOLO for real-time object detection and face recognition. Still in development, it promises to set a new standard in automated security solutions.

projects.title: Algoduel
projects.description: Algoduel is a strategic game where you craft an algorithm to control your fighter as they battle against AI opponents. It merges coding challenges with engaging gameplay for a unique competitive experience.

projects.title: Capsule
projects.description: Capsule is a minimalist personal blog template designed for developers. It offers a clean interface, easy customization, and supports markdown for content creation.

projects.title: Bloondubs
projects.description: Bloondubs is a dynamic web application that allows users to create and share short video clips with added sound effects and filters. It's built with React and leverages Redux for state management.

projects.title: Pirate-Personality
projects.description: Pirate-Personality is a fun quiz app that determines which pirate from history you most resemble. Built with Vue.js, it offers an engaging user experience with interactive questions and dynamic results.

projects.title: Rollbone
projects.description: Rollbone is an online platform for tabletop RPG enthusiasts. It provides tools for character creation, campaign management, and virtual dice rolling, all within a collaborative environment.
